text: Unhon ne jawab diya “aey shoaib, kya teri namaz tujhey yeh sikhati hai ke hum un sarey maboodon ko chodh dein jinki parastish hamare baap dada karte thay? Ya yeh ke humko apne maal mein apne mansha(as we please) ke mutabiq tasrruf(spend/use) karne ka ikhtiyar na ho? Bas tu hi to ek aali zarf aur raastbaaz aadmi ( forbearing and right-directed) reh gaya hai”
